data.description: Lab Summary: Samsung Research America (SRA) plays a pivotal role in developing the next generation of discovery in software, user experience and services for future products that can enrich your life. Our mission is to research and develop new technologies by partnering with the best and brightest and creating a collaborative environment between industry and academia. Headquartered in Silicon Valley, with locations in many technology centers in North America, SRA is driven to build a culture of innovation that rapidly translates research and new ideas into the unexpected. We build core technologies and systems powering Galaxy Intelligence, a next-generation virtual personal assistant, brought to you by the team that created Siri. Galaxy Intelligence provides a truly open platform that lets any developer extend its knowledge and capabilities. Position Summary: For this position we are looking to add few interns to support our voice technology projects. One will focus more specifically in advanced research in Automatic Speech Recognition, including Acoustic and Speech based Large Language Modeling, model compression and personalization. Experience with Android would be very desirable. Work streams are also on wake-up word detection, including feature extraction, modeling and personalization. Other projects include voice recognition, language recognition, speech enhancement to name a few. We are looking for candidates with knowledge of Deep/Machine Learning, LLM, Android app building, model compression and Digital Signal Processing. Position Responsibilities: Build LLM based speech applications and research experience with LLMs, model compression Research in Automatic Speech Recognition, Acoustic and Language Modeling, and personalization, wakeword detection Development experience on Android platform Required Skills: Pursuing MS or PhD in Computer Science Knowledge of Deep/Machine Learning, LLM, Digital Signal Processing C, C++, JAVA/Android, PYTHON Tensorflow, Pytorch Our total rewards programs are designed to motivate and engage exceptional talent. The hourly pay rate range for roles at this level is listed below, but may be higher or lower in other states due to geographic differentials in the labor market. Within the hourly pay rate range, individual rates depend on a number of factors—including the role’s function and location as well as the individual’s knowledge, skills, experience, education and training. This is part of our comprehensive compensation package with annual bonus eligibility and generous benefits to help you live life well.Hourly Pay Rate Range$44 - $63 USDAdditional Information Disclosure of Trade Secrets Samsung has a strict policy on trade secrets. The position will require the incumbent to sit and stand at a desk, communicate in person and by telephone, and frequently operate standard office equipment, such as telephones and computers.
